{{{

File Rename Engine:

Functions:

- Mask, NMask, EMask   (mask plugins)
- SR, NSR, ESR
- Case, NCase, ECase
- UDF (Filter etc...)

Chain Example:

Presets\dummy.mrs
 Mask("[C10+5:2]. [N4-]")
 SR("_", " ", "full")
 Case("Upper")
 Mask("backup [N] backup")



ProcessFile(fn, ?) - Evaluate rename functions on file


}}}
